data.name: Lost Artifacts Mysterious Book Collector's Edition Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the original soundtracks to Lost Artifacts Mysterious Book Collector's Edition including 4 tracks in different themes.
We have collected for you amazing soundtracks, which will help to feel the adventure atmosphere.
